name: Magic Tricks by Mikael Montier
description:
Magic Tricks by Mikael Montier is a collection of the 20 most epic magic effects ever released on smartphones. Using this incredible magic app, you will be able to surprise, baffle and impress friends and family members!

Official Trailer: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0_vSckyaT14

This magic app includes many tricks using the most advanced augmented reality technology and compatible with the most famous playing cards of the market (detection of more than 50 different decks*).


Magic tricks created by Mikael Montier.
/// www.magicapps.co

TV performance rights are not included with purchase.
All TV rights are reserved and available from Mikael Montier.
Please contact us at contact@magicapps.co for details.

This magic app is intended for entertainment purposes and does not provide any supernatural powers.


* Bicycle 52 Proof Ace, Bicycle 1800 Vintage Series, Bicycle Alchemy England, Bicycle Amber Stag, Bicycle Anne Stokes Collection Dark Hearts, Bicycle Anne Stokes Steampunk, Bicycle Archangels, Bicycle Brosmind, Bicycle Craft Beer, Bicycle Dragon Back, Bicycle Everyday Zombies, Bicycle Expert Back, Bicycle Favole, Bicycle Flying Machines, Bicycle Golden Spike, Bicycle Karnival, Bicycle Karnival Death Heads, Bicycle Nautic Back, Bicycle Pin-Up, Bicycle Pluma, Bicycle Psycho Clowns, Bicycle Russell and Morgan, Bicycle Shadow Masters, Bicycle Skull, Bicycle Standard, Bicycle Steampunk, Bicycle Steampunk Bandits, Bicycle Street_Art, Bicycle Tragic Royalty, Bicycle US Presidents, Bicycle White Ghost, Bicycle Zombified, Altruism, Animal Kingdom, Arcane, Aristocrat, Artifice, Artisan, Aviator, Bee, Coca_Cola, Fontaine, Fultons Clip Joint, Hoyle Standard, Keepers, Madison Rounders, Mechanic Deck, Tally Ho, White Lions, WPT.

---

Our Magic Apps have been downloaded by more than 500K users and are featured in the most famous newspapers, magic magazines, high-tech blogs...
